name: Plateformer2D
description:
This game is a simple platformer inspired by Celeste. 

It was mainly a game to test the Input system of Unity with different controllers and a platformer engine. 

Hope you'll enjoy !

Controlls :

AWSD/D-Pad: Move

Space/A button : Jump/Double Jump/Wall jump

A Key/B button : Dash

Tab key/LB : Sprint
